DOC.brief_summary: - Does the utility of external feedback in terms of goal-directed LLL approach during STS training immediately improve functional ability relating to walking in ambulatory patients with SCI? - Does the utility of LLL feedback improve functional ability relating to walking in ambulatory patients with SCI after 2-week training?
DOC.brief_title: Sit-to-stand With Feedback in SCI Patients
DOC.detailed_description: - To compare immediate effects of STS training with and without LLL feedback on functional ability relating to walking in ambulatory patients with SCI - To compare 2 weeks effects of STS training with and without LLL feedback on functional ability relating to walking in ambulatory patients with SCI.
DOC.criteria: Ambulatory spinal cord injury patients Deformity of musculoskeletal system
